Oasis: The Definitive History

Oasis, formed in Manchester in 1991, became one of the most influential and commercially successful bands in British music history. Led by the Gallagher brothers, Noel and Liam, they defined the Britpop era of the 1990s.

Quick Facts

  • Total Albums: 7 studio albums
  • Singles: 28 UK singles
  • Total Sales: Over 75 million records worldwide
  • UK Number Ones: 8 singles, 8 albums

Most Successful Album

(What's the Story) Morning Glory? (1995)

Over 22 million copies sold worldwide

Biggest Single

Wonderwall (1995)

Over 1.3 million copies sold in the UK
